title: The ADC role is dead, change my mind!

replies.body: This kinda of Mentality is what happens when the Coddled have to work for things

Many would argue that the ADC role is thriving due to diversity, but marksmen's are the worst they have been in a while. they can still hard carry but why play kai sa or ashe when you can just play Yasuo adc and hyper carry the game if you get even slightly ahead? I feel marksmens got hit to hard, I no longer fear them, they are just free kills as a jungler, but when you got a vlad adc with a brand support (as a jungler) I won't go near bot lane with a 50 foot pole. I won't say they are dead as they can still fuck you up, but they are not what they were.

I agree, there is no more fear from the ADCs, especially with the new items, the crit adcs are useless and they need ton of gold to actually do something, and what u mean by adc am talking about the marksman and not this new meta where anyone can claim to be adc and dominate the lane and/or hyper carry a game like you said with yas. So sad, i used to ADC main and carry the game all by myself, but now even if i win my lane a bit, am still useless in team fights, i literally deal nothing, cant do anything.... just so sad

I feel you, I was a kled/ornn toplane main, I can't even look at the cancer my lane has become, I just went jungle volibear/ramus so I can camp the shit out of a lane and get whatever champion fed asf and get them to hypercarry the game by 15 minutes, its just how you have to win man. Its tragic.

The Bot lane Carry role isn't dead it's fine
The Marksman sub class is still the dominate subclass in the role and it's not even close. 
8 of the top 10 pick rate champs bot lane are Marksman. 
The other 2 are Yasuo who is arguably a melee "ADC" and 
Morde a champ that has special XP sharing and was designed with a kit to be played in that role in the first place, but got bullied out of his lane like Urgot, Quinn and Corki
Holy shit  ehh who Knew that by Nerfing the Broken AF.  Stat check Marksmen.  To a reasonable level you would see melee champs designed for botlane.  In the Botlane
No, the marksmen aren't required in 100% team comps anymore. This class has been so broken for years that people assimilated that a team *requires* a marksman to be functionnal.
Pretty sure Apdo said adcs are still good, but boards > apdo imo, nerf assassins and buff immobile mages and adcs :)
The adc role is fine, change my mind.
